amendment.description: To make available $4,000,000 for the Cyberspace Solarium Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3710 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3710 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5900; text: CR S5900) To make available $4,000,000 for the Cyberspace Solarium Commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3710 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3710 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
